handleSelectItem=(itemId,type)=>{setSelectedItems(prev=>{const key=`${type}-${itemId}`;if(prev.includes(key)){return prev.filter(id=>id!==key);}else{return[...prev,key];}});};const handleSelectAll=(type,items)=>{const allSelected=items.every(item=>selectedItems.includes(`${type}-${item.id}`));if(allSelected){setSelectedItems(prev=>prev.filter(id=>!id.startsWith(`${type}-`)));}else{const
